items.summary: Add the user-uploaded image file (1000795148-1.jpg) to the frontend as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated/ and ensure it is available at runtime via the /assets/generated/ URL path.

Update the site header logo rendering so the uploaded image (1000795148-1.jpg) is displayed in the header (and any other places that reuse the Logo component) instead of the current placeholder logo path (/assets/predicta-logo.png).

Centralize the logo path so the Logo component reads the logo URL from the branding theme configuration (frontend/src/branding/theme.ts), and set that configured logo path to /assets/generated/1000795148-1.jpg.
